acf.long_description:
During my work experience I have developed various web applications, mainly working with the following technologies: Reactjs (both with React only and with Redux+Saga, now moving to React Hooks + Context API), Angular 2+ and AngularJS, plus obviously Jquery-html5-css3-js, (frontend side) and .Net technologies, such as Web API/Asp MVC – Entity Framework, Node.js + Express â€“ Microsoft Sql server and MongoDB (backend side).

I have worked also on mobile development projects, targeting Android platform mainly. Coming from a web-developer background it was a natural choice to select multi-platform technology web based as Cordova, with the support of Ionic Framework (using several plugins to reach native functionalities).

In my first years I also developed Windows applications (mainly C# .Net with WPF), multi-platform applications (C++ Qt framework for Linux), often in the domain of cryptography and security, and I DLLs (C/C++ language) to communicate with external devices through API.

I enjoy a lot working with Microsoft Visual Studio and Visual Studio Code, depending on the project! They are my favorite IDE. I also developed some project with Qt Creator and Borland/Embarcadero.

I am passionate about my job!
I constantly train myself, mainly through online courses the evening after the work.

acf.main_personal_description: Hi, I'm a software engineer and I love everything related to software development for web and mobile platforms.
acf.longer_description:
Hi, I graduated with a First in Electronic and ICT Engineering from the University of Pavia in Italy in 2009 and I got a High School Diploma in Computer Technology in 2006.

I have a strong background in Information Technology as I carried out various IT projects during my professional experience.

I am a passionate Web Developer (and a continuous learner) with 9 years of professional experience in different European cities.

acf.long_description:
Web application to ask for apartment estimation, fix appointment with an expert, chat with him, be notified about missing document and upload them, online estimation payment and estimation document download. It involves the following technologies:
  • Angular5 front end (plus obviously HTML5-CSS3-JS and other common js libraries)
  • ASP.NET Core 2.1 Web API with microservices backend to expose web services
  • UX professionally designed by an external company
  • Logging system to Elastic Search with Kibana
  • Stripe platform for online payments
  • IdentityServer Framework for Authorization/Authentication
  • CRM Microsoft Dynamics integration as ticketing system

acf.title: React.js (Redux + Saga) + Node.js + MondoDb
acf.short_description: Web app - Dashboard to manage state of progress of various client's communications
acf.long_description:
Mainly list and details web application with minor crud operations to keep track of client’s internal official communications. It involves the following technologies:
  • React.js (Redux + Saga)
  • Node.js + Express + MongoDB
  • Passport.js for Authorization/Authentication
  • Ui developed from a commercial template
  • E2E tests developed with Nightwatch.js

title.rendered: React.js (hooks and context api) + Node.js + MondoDb

acf.title: React.js (hooks and context api) + Node.js + MondoDb
acf.long_description:
Migration of React.js app to use React hooks + Context API for state management and further app development. This is a web app to generate webapp based on json configuration (similarly to https://jasonette.com/, except it is for web application). Worked both on frontend and backend. It involves the following technologies:
  • React hooks + Context API for state management
  • Node.js + Express + MongoDB
  • Passport.js for Authorization/Authentication
  • UX design with Adobe XD
  • E2E tests developed with Nightwatch.js
